name: Target Number
description:
How to Play
  • Click a number to it to its neighbours — up, down, left & right.
  • Once a number is clicked it can't be clicked again, and it won't grow.
  • To win, sum of all the numbers marked with a target must be equal to the target number.
Credits
  • @y444 — game idea, easier parts of the code
  • @JaysyTracy — more complicated parts of the code
  • All my friends who reluctantly test the game — invaluable feedback
Assets Used

The game uses third party assets:

  • Various graphical asset packs by Kenney
  • Skybox textures by BORODAR
  • Sound effects from Audiojungle
  • Additional fonts from Dafont

For these assets' licences please refer to their respective web pages.

Changelog
  • October 23 2018 — the first draft release
  • November 20 2018 — the second release, containing several UI fixes
Feeback

Is always appreciated.
